Name: MD SHAHBAZ SIDDIQUEE
Review:
WORST SERVICE EVER


Etni Ghatiya Service Hai Boat ki, Tmhara Viswaas uth jayega, November 2020 ko maine purchase kiya amazon se, February me sound bar and sub woofer connect hona bnd ho gaye,Then maine complaint kiya boat customer care me, unka technician bhi visit kiya, uske baad jo wo parts mangwane, To Bhai aaj 31st of July hai, wo abhi tk nhi aya, aur mai boat customer care me baat krke thk gaya, wo log bs kahte hain ki MAAFI CHAHENGE SIR, MAI APKE COMPLAINT KO AAGE FORWARD KR DETA HU, that' it Fir naahi mera sound bar repair kiya in loge ne, aur fir maine complaint krna chor diya ab November me meri warranty Khatam hone wali hai üòî Bhai Product Baht Accha Hai, Tmhe Sound Baht Pasand Aane wala hai But Kabhi bhi tmhe inki service ki zarurat pr gayi to fir wo product tmhara Boat Brand ka last product hoga
